subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Investec Loyal won the Sydney to Hobart yacht race, beating Wild Oats XI, but the racing committee charged that Investec Loyal had used a television helicopter pilot to spy on Wild Oats.
snippet: Investec Loyal won the Sydney to Hobart yacht race, beating Wild Oats XI, but the racing committee charged that Investec Loyal had used a television helicopter pilot to spy on Wild Oats.
